tool_description: Get API access to information on our web site AllSportDB.com
title: AllSportDB.com

api_list.name: Get competitions
api_list.description: Returns the list of competitions (at least one parameter required: id, name, sportId, sport)

optional_parameters.name: continentId
optional_parameters.description: continent object Id, refer to Get Continents method

optional_parameters.name: sportId
optional_parameters.description: sport object Id, refer to Get Sports method

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://allsportdb-com.p.rapidapi.com/competitions"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "allsportdb-com.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get region flag
Get locations
api_list.description: Returns the list of locations (at least one parameter required: id, name, countryId, country)

optional_parameters.name: regionId
optional_parameters.description: region object Id, refer to Get Regions method

optional_parameters.name: countryId
optional_parameters.description: country object Id, refer to Get Countries method

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://allsportdb-com.p.rapidapi.com/locations"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "allsportdb-com.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get calendar
api_list.description: Returns the list of events and games (required parameters: week or dateFrom and dateTo, results limited to 50 records)

optional_parameters.name: countryId
optional_parameters.description: country object Id, refer to Get Countries method

optional_parameters.name: competitionId
optional_parameters.description: competition object Id, refer to Get Competitions method

optional_parameters.name: gamesTypeId
optional_parameters.description: games type object Id, refer to Get Games Types method

optional_parameters.name: continentId
optional_parameters.description: continent object Id, refer to Get Continents method

optional_parameters.name: regionId
optional_parameters.description: region object Id, refer to Get Regions method

optional_parameters.name: week
optional_parameters.description: week index (for example, 0 = this week, 1 = next week, -1 = last week, etc.)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: page number in case result limit is reached

optional_parameters.name: sportId
optional_parameters.description: sport object Id, refer to Get Sports method

optional_parameters.name: locationId
optional_parameters.description: location object Id, refer to Get Locations method

api_list.name: Get country flag
Get regions
api_list.description: Returns the list of country regions, United Kingdom only (at least one parameter required: id, name, countryId, country)

optional_parameters.name: countryId
optional_parameters.description: country object Id, refer to Get Countries method

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://allsportdb-com.p.rapidapi.com/regions"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "allsportdb-com.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
